Key Match Events: Lassina Traoré scored a quick double in the first half (35th, 38th minute).
Hassane Bandé scored the third goal for Burkina Faso (60th minute, penalty).
Zeliat Nkhoma reduced the deficit for Malawi late in the match (80th minute).
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burkina Faso took the lead in Group L with a better goal difference compared to Senegal.
